com.xith3d.collider
Class CollisionSystem

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.collider.CollisionSystem
public class CollisionSystem
extends Object

The collision system manages a set of colliders and adjusts the moving ones per frame such that they never intersect with any other collider.

Originally Coded by David Yazel on Dec 22, 2003 at 9:37:09 PM.

Constructor Detail

CollisionSystem

public CollisionSystem(long stepSize)
Parameters:
stepSize - The maximim time we use to calculate collision over time. So if the maximum step time is 10 ms and 40 ms has passed since the last calculation then we will step through the system 4 times before returning. -1 means to not use a step time and to calculate only once no matter how much time has passed.
